definition: lifting device consisting of a horizontal cylinder turned by a crank on which a cable or rope winds, pull or lift up with or as if with a winch
details:
noun
- lifting device consisting of a horizontal cylinder turned by a crank on which a cable or rope winds
= synonyms: windlass
verb
- pull or lift up with or as if with a winch
= example: pull or lift up with or as if with a winch
